actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to establish the Federal Protective Service police force within the General Services Administration, and provide minimum training, pay, and other benefits for such police force.

summary.text: Establishes within the General Services Administration the Federal Protective Service for the protection of property under the jurisdiction of the Administration. Provides for the pay, training, and retirement of the members of such Service.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Federal Protective Service police force within the General Services Administration, and provide minimum training, pay, and other benefits for such police force.
